text: Songs of Cinema is the 23rd studio album by American singer Michael Bolton. The album was released on February 10, 2017 by Frontiers Records. The album contains a ballad version of Bolton's song with The Lonely Island, "Jack Sparrow". ==Track listing== # "Beauty and the Beast" (featuring Deborah Sasson) – 3:09 # "When a Man Loves a Woman" (2017 version) – 3:56 # "Stand by Me" – 2:57 # "I Got a Woman" – 3:21 # "I Will Always Love You" (featuring Dolly Parton) – 3:36 # "Old Time Rock and Roll" – 3:07 # "I Heard It Through the Grapevine" – 4:06 # "Cupid" – 3:10 # "Somewhere Over the Rainbow" – 3:28 # "As Time Goes By" – 3:17 # "Jack Sparrow" (ballad) – 1:43 ==Charts== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2017) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- ! scope="row"| Australian Albums (ARIA) | 81 |- |- |- |- |} ==References== Category:2017 albums Category:Michael Bolton albums
title: Songs of Cinema
